summary.span: 表示要存储在数据库中或从数据库中检索的二进制数据的可变长度流。

span.span: Represents a variable-length stream of binary data to be stored in or retrieved from a database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要获取对象，请调用方法。To obtain an object, call the method.
